nschat.tcp

Class TCP

  • java.lang.Object
    • nschat.tcp.TCP

  • public class TCP
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to create packets that can be send over the network
    Author:
    Bart Meyers

      static class  TCP.PacketType
      Enum with 3 bit values on the three most significant bits for the packet type.

      • nextPacket

        public static byte[] nextPacket(java.lang.String data,
                                TCP.PacketType type,
                                SequenceNumberSet seq,
                                byte flags,
                                short ack)
        creates a packet.
        Parameters:
        data - Data that will be send
        type - The type of packet
        seq - The SequenceNumberSet to generate SEQ numbers with
        flags - The flags that need to be set
        ack - The acknowledgment number
        Returns:
        the packet
